query:
SELECT t.id, t.titulo, t.estado, t.reuniaoId, r.data as dataReuniao, t.createdAt 
FROM topicos_reuniao_gestores t 
LEFT JOIN reunioes_gestores r ON t.reuniaoId = r.id 
WHERE t.estado IN ('analisado', 'pendente') 
ORDER BY t.createdAt DESC;
